channel.title: Cereal – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: Picture bite sized pieces of delicious blueberry french toast swimming merrily in a bowl of sweetened cream. This blend showcases warm, succulent blueberries and opulent french toast, for a vape that is ideal for either breakfast or a midday snack.

item.title: Rubicon
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Our take on everyone's favorite fruit flavored pebble cereal.
item.content:encoded: This blend launches sugary, lemon lime tones into a willing palate, and finishes with a notable barrage of sweet bavarian creams. Although not fortified by vitamins and minerals, Rubicon is still a cereal worthy of any breakfast regimen.

item.title: Radiance
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Flakey corn cereal with strawberries and milk.
item.content:encoded: This is a delectable blend of fruity, flakey corn cereal dressed with pleasantly plump strawberries. On the inhale, you are greeted by a medley of fruit cereals with mellow cues of marshmallow. While on the exhale, the experience is brought home by the succulent vanilla cream.

item.title: Amino
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Peanut butter and banana cereal with cream and caramel accents.
item.content:encoded: Honey graham cracker cereal, creamy caramel, delectable peanut butter, and ripe banana blend together in this dreamy smorgasbord. Backed by opulent vanilla accents, Amino will leave you breathless. Which is a bummer, because one puff is just not enough when this is in your tank.

item.title: Opus
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Waffle crisp cereal with strawberries and maple syrup on the finish.
item.content:encoded: Inspired by our other signature waffle blend “Lipid”, this waffle cereal proclaims similar notes (crisp waffle cereal and buttery maple syrup), but with the gratifying garnish of sweet, tender strawberries. Opus is a profound breakfast experience that will get your day started on the right foot.

item.title: Zeno
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Sugar dusted cereal with sweet, milky undertones.
item.content:encoded: Zeno is a simple, but elegantly executed blend of corn cereal dusted with sweet powdered sugar. This sugary blend is sure to satisfy both cereal and dessert lovers alike.

item.title: Proton
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Apple cereal with notes of cinnamon and sugar.
item.content:encoded: This isn’t the apple cinnamon cereal you remember (which may or may not rhyme with Japple Ax). Our recipe features a mouthwatering blend of cinnamon and sweet apple, bathed in smooth vanilla cream. Proton is a blend that will have you searching for a bigger tank.

item.title: Lipid
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A savory waffle crisp cereal with a hint of maple syrup.
item.content:encoded: Buttery maple syrup and crispy waffle cereal come together to create the breakfast vape of champions. A tantalizing breakfast blend that will inspire you to create reasons for a second breakfast, and a third, and a…

item.title: Micron
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sweet and nutty cereal with milk.
item.content:encoded: This blend features a song of milk and honey that’s worthy of a Grammy. Critics agree, Micron is the perfect balance of hearty nuts and crispy toasted oat cereal that’ll have you making sure your tank is topped off.

item.title: Barbaric Crunch
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Sweet cinnamon and gingerbread cereal with milk that's reminiscent of that famous "Captain" cereal.
item.content:encoded: Barbaric Crunch is a unique blend of cinnamon and gingerbread cereal with sweetened cream. On the inhale, you are met with the flavor and aroma of gingerbread. While on the exhale, the sweet cinnamon and cream will gently caress your palate.
